transcript:
turn has come," thought Prince Andrew, and striking his horse he rode up to Kutiizov. 
"The Apsherons must be stopped, your ex- cellency," cried he. But at that very instant a cloud of smoke spread all round, firing was heard quite close at hand, and a voice of naive terror barely two steps from Prince Andrew shouted, "Brothers! All's lost!" And at this voice, as if at a command, everyone began to run.
